Authors:
Mário Gadanho, M. Weifl, José Paulo Sampaio, Robert
Bauer
Title:
New taxa in the Tremellales: Bulleribasidium oberjochense
gen. et sp. nov., Papiliotrema bandonii gen. et sp. nov. and
Fibulobasidium murrhardtense sp. nov.
Keywords:
dimorphic heterobasidiomycetes; molecular phylogeny;
systematics; 26S rDNA; Tremellales; ultrastructure
Abstract:
Two new genera, Bulleribasidium and Papiliotrema, and
three new species, B. oberjochense, P. bandonii and Fibulobasidium
murrhardtense are described. An integrated analysis of morphological,
ultrastructural, physiological, and molecular data indicates that the
new taxa belong to the Tremellales (Basidiomycota). Relevant
characteristics of the new genera and species are discussed and compared
with those of closely related taxa.
